It has always been a loyal customer of Pearl Bar and Shanli Japanese cuisine.But in the past few times, I have felt inexplicable.In the case of almost no guests, the two meals stuffed their positions at the door.At first glance, it was very reasonable, but in fact, the two people could not put the meal for the two on the table. As a result, the service staff actually put the cup teapot on the higher cabinet next to it.Very unprofessional.

Because we often come, we know that when we ca nâ€™t put it in, we are proactively proposed, but we are still rejected, thinking that the seat of the four people will be lower X4.

Seeing that we ordered two beverages and two meals, and we had a little words, we could change the place.But still insist that because we ordered more than two people's low disappearance, we can change the place.

In this way, it is better to let the guests order before sitting down, and determine that there is a low X4 quota before deciding what seats to sit.Don't be a bar, transform as a fast food restaurant.

Even the tea restaurant that values â€‹â€‹the table rate will be adjusted according to the degree of busyness at that time. If there are too many guests, they will ask customers to sit in a specific seat.

You know, I went to the pearl bar so many times, and there were never more than 1/3 of the guests.Generally speaking, as a service for the five -star restaurant, customers want to sit in a relatively large seat because of business requirements, and if they are allowed, they will try to meet the customer's requirements as much as possible.However, obviously, the pearl bar has survived the turnover rate and each seat to the needs of guests.But they do not increase the average unit price because the bar itself is also dissatisfied.It will only drive away the guests.

The bar cafe in the restaurant, his functions of guests are often a place for business meetings, not mainly dining.The behavior of putting the cup teapot on the cabinet made me visually open.I have never encountered such a thing in the bar and cafe in the five -star hotel.

What if guests or tenants?Low eliminates?What is the significance of dinner time?Will the guests go in to eat a biscuit and call a cup free boiling water?

The epidemic does cause many managers to be degraded.Originally, it was a frequent guest of the bar on the second floor of the Xihua Hotel. During the epidemic before the closure of Xihua, the bar did not change at noon. After teaching the management changes, it was decided to find another suitable place in the future.Otherwise, for the arrangement of the seat, it was out of favor in front of my partner and guests.
